document.full_text: japan has told the u.n. nuclear wathchdog that a heightened state of alert has been declared at the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant after friday's major earthquake, the vienna-based agency said.
document.title: heightened state of alert at japan atom plant: iaea
lines_and_colors: japan has told the u.n. nuclear wathchdog that a heightened state of alert has been declared at the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant after friday's major earthquake, the vienna-based agency said.
